body_html:
According to @alicanb, this should have been fixed in current master:

>>> c = torch.tensor([[2.3126, 0.8453]]).expand([2, 1, 2])
>>> print(torch._standard_gamma(c))
tensor([[[1.0952, 3.2572]],

        [[6.3712, 0.3182]]])

>>> print(torch._standard_gamma(c.clone()))
tensor([[[4.5180, 0.2300]],

        [[1.1852, 0.7473]]])

body:
According to @alicanb, this should have been fixed in current master:
```
>>> c = torch.tensor([[2.3126, 0.8453]]).expand([2, 1, 2])
>>> print(torch._standard_gamma(c))
tensor([[[1.0952, 3.2572]],

        [[6.3712, 0.3182]]])

>>> print(torch._standard_gamma(c.clone()))
tensor([[[4.5180, 0.2300]],

        [[1.1852, 0.7473]]])
```
